text: This is a flow chart the UFC is sending out to fighters’ teams ahead of UFC 251. Five COVID-19 tests over the course of the trip. More details here: https://t.co/laruePhqtv https://t.co/6PQHCU23CK

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Live: The Ultimate Fighting Championship
entity.description: Mixed martial arts action from a UFC event.

entity.name: UFC 250
entity.description: The Brazilian two-weight champion cruised to a decision win over Canada's Spencer, continuing to cement her place as the consensus best women's MMA fighter of all time. Earlier on the night, bantamweights Cody Garbrandt, Aljamain Sterling and Sean O'Malley made statements with big finishes.

entity.name: UFC 251: Kamaru Usman and Jorge Masvidal set to face off in welterweight title bout
entity.description: The two fighters will challenge each other in Abu Dhabi for the welterweight championship, while battles for the featherweight and bantamweight titles also feature on the main card. Keep up with all the top commentary and latest conversation right here.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
